About.Hours & facilities: Open Wed. 2pm-4pmm Sat 10am-12pm, Sun 2pm-4pm, or by appointment. General reference assistance available. Copying services available A4.

About.Acquisition focus: Local history of areas surrounding and including Swan Reach (Murbko to Bowhill and Black Hill to Galga) photographs and written material, aboriginal heritage. (20% in-house).

About.Major holdings: School records, burial records, minutes, local and district photographs, family and local history, books, maps 1880- .

Contact.Street address: Swan Reach Museum, 20 Nildottie Road, Swan Reach 5354
